verses.roman:
pathe ye śūkara-mṛga, jāni tomāra haya"
vyādha kahe,--"yei kaha, sei ta' niścaya"

synonyms: pathe—on the path; ye—those; śūkara-mṛga—boars and other animals; jāni—I can understand; tomāra haya—all belong to you; vyādha kahe—the hunter replied; yei kaha—whatever you are saying; sei ta' niścaya—it is a fact.
translation: " 'I was wondering whether all the boars and other animals that are half-killed belong to you.' The hunter replied, 'Yes, what you are saying is so.'
